text: Rhode Montijo (born January 17, 1973, in El Centro, California) is an American animator, children’s book author, and illustrator. He made and co-created the web series Happy Tree Friends with Aubrey Ankrum and Kenn Navarro. He voiced Lumpy and Splendid before leaving the show in 2005. He is also known for making the books Pablo’s Inferno and Cloud Boy. Category:American animators Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Rhode Montijo
